price: O’na rahmetimizden kardeşi Harun’u peygamber olarak bağışlamıştık.
arabic: وَوَهَبۡنَا لَهُۥ مِن رَّحۡمَتِنَآ أَخَاهُ هَٰرُونَ نَبِيّٗا

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: wawahabnā lahu min raḥmatinā akhāhu hārūna nabiyyan
